statements: DELETE FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Retailer = 'Retailer1' AND Supplier = 'Supplier1';
DELETE FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Retailer = 'Amazon' AND OrderDate = '2023-10-15';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE sender = 'Manufacturer A';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE receiver = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM supply_chain_info WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM transaction_info WHERE buyer_id = 201 AND amount > 1000
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND status = 'active';
